## BatchOperationsService.batchClassify() method

Classifies a batch of items. This operation returns an instance of 'BatchOperationCreationResult' type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static batchClassify({ requestModel, }: {
        requestModel: BatchClassifyOrUnClassifyRequest;
    }): CancelablePromise<BatchOperationCreationResult>;
```
